nodes.text: The Arda I resistance force was formed in opposition to the Galactic Empire several years before the Battle of Yavin. They set up a base in the Gauntlet. After the formation of the Rebel Alliance, the group became part of the larger struggle and absorbed a number of smaller cells.
The Ardan resistance was mentioned in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game adventure Onslaught at Arda I.
